Description:
Detects suspicious Ruby on Rails exceptions that could indicate exploitation attempts

Author: Thomas Patzke
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Ruby on Rails Framework Exceptions
Query: sourcetype like 'ruby_on_rails-%' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%actioncontroller::invalidauthenticitytoken%' or log like '%actioncontroller::invalidcrossoriginrequest%' or log like '%actioncontroller::methodnotallowed%' or log like '%actioncontroller::badrequest%' or log like '%actioncontroller::parametermissing%')
